title: Mouth to mouth rescue breathing
creator_credit: Walter Reed Army Institute of Research
brief_description: A record of an experiment at the Baltimore City Hospital Department of Anesthiology, in the methods and effectiveness of mouth-to-mouth rescue breathing in comparison with back pressure artificial respiration.
